function Paintings() { const [spacing, setSpacing] = React.useState(2); const classes = useStyles(); const handleChange = (event) => { setSpacing(Number(event.target.value)); }; return (

In my free time, I enjoy smearing big blobs of color across canvases. Here are a few. If you have questions or comments, shoot me an email at myradotzel[at]gmail[dot]com.

); } export default Paintings;
